EmailTemplate.description: Added after go-live to differentiate from First Defect Notice
EmailTemplate.name: Final Rejection Notice NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: Rejection Notice: {!Rejection__c.Application_Type__c} Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
• The application for {!Rejection__c.Applicant__c} has been rejected for not meeting all of the application requirements. • Please review the attached Rejection Notice, which lists the incomplete requirements and provides information on how you can continue the application process.
https://cadir.my.site.com/registrations
Sincerely,
Licensing & Registration Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California
